content: the cozy hygge blanket wrap is a fast and easy crochet pattern that you are going to love making and love wearing even more this isn t your traditional triangle shawl so you can also call it a blanket scarf either way you re going to want to wrap yourself up in this cozy rectangular blanket shawl the moment you re finished making it this modern design only uses one simple stitch because we re letting the yarn do all of the work for us more on that later the materials you will need to complete this pattern are * red heart hygge yarn 5oz - 7 skeins in cloud * 8mm crochet hook * tapestry needle
